name: sacred-fire
flavor_text: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
